thread.title: Sinkhole opens up on busy road
thread.title_full: Sinkhole opens up on busy road - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Sinkhole opens up on busy road
text:
One lane has been closed Credit: ITV Meridian A large sinkhole has opened up on a busy road in Hampshire.
The hole - around 5ft by 3ft - appeared on on the A27 Southampton Road in Titchfield in Hampshire.
One lane is closed and is likely to remain closed for at the rest of the day at least.
The sinkhole could easily damage a car Credit: ITV Meridian Police are ensuring that vehicles avoid the sinkhole Credit: ITV Meridian Watch video from the scene below:
Play video Travel Hampshire & Isle of Wight
